results.title: Metformin attenuates vascular pathology by increasing expression of insulin-degrading enzyme in a mixed model of cerebral amyloid angiopathy and type 2 diabetes mellitus.
results.text_hl: However, the therapeutic effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Cerebral_Amyloid_Angiopathy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D016657 @@@CAA@@@ are unclear.
